title: Face Recognition System
description: The Face Recognition System is an advanced AI-driven project that detects and recognizes human faces in images and videos. It leverages machine learning models for facial feature extraction and comparison, ensuring high accuracy and efficiency. The system can be used for various applications such as security, attendance tracking, and personalized user experiences.
features: High accuracy with machine learning models
Supports multiple faces in a single frame
Secure storage and processing of face data
